import.text:
Import questions via spreadsheet


1. Download the template spreadsheet below.
2. Upload the file below and then import it (only Excel files are supported).
3. If there are errors in the file, you will need to address these and re-upload the file.

import.text:
Import users via spreadsheet


1. Download the template spreadsheet below
2. Populate the spreadsheet with the user information, completing all fields and using the country and role drop downs provided.
3. Upload the file below and then import it (only Excel files are supported).
4. If there are errors in the file, you will need to address these and re-upload the file.
5. Once users have been imported, they will receive an invitation via email. Users should follow instructions in the email to complete their registration.

Note that this function is only available for importing assessment leads and enumerators. All admin users should be added using the invite user function.
